sourcesContent: import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import './styles.css'; import { Form, Input, Radio, Select, DatePicker, InputNumber, Switch, Checkbox, Upload, Button, } from 'antd'; const { RangePicker } = DatePicker; const { TextArea } = Input; const options = [ { label: 'Label A', value: 'A' }, { label: 'Label B', value: 'B' }, { label: 'Label C', value: 'C' }, { label: 'Label D', value: 'D' }, ]; export default function App(props: { onSubmit: (data: any) => void }) { const { onSubmit } = props; const [form] = Form.useForm(); return (
